name: Polene Jump
description:
WARNING : This game is extremely janky in some aspects and I am NOT planning on working on it again. I'm uploading it here for archiving purposes.

Polene Jump is a little game i've worked on alone for just about a bit more than a week as an assignment for my unity classes. I had just barely learned how the engine works and as a result a lot of stuff in this game is unoptimized and janky, it doesnt even have a pause button lmao. Still, i've had fun making this and i hope people can have fun trying it out.

The premise is this girl called Polene needing to climb her way up a tower while avoiding obstacles along the way. You can jump, double jump, wall jump, slide down... The gameplay is heavily inspired by Nitrome's Leap Day.

Polene was created by a friend of mine, Triq Or Trick 
2D assets used : Pixel Adventure by Pixel Frog
Royalty free music credited in the README file

CONTROLS :

  • press space or click to jump, that's it lmao

the game has two levels and i haven't programmed a way to leave the levels other than quitting the game so just alt+f4 if you wanna leave.
